title: Can we sell cats, dogs, snakes & other exotic animals & Can we keep them as pets? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: Holly says it is permissible to open a pet shop and sell cats and other animals and can we keep exotic and wild animals as pets well it is not permissible to buy or sell dogs cats and things that have no benefit such as snakes this is prohibited monkeys this is prohibited but if you want to keep exotic animals such as parrots fish something that is beautiful to own and to possess someone comes and says I'd like to to to grow an anaconda or a black widow spider this is totally prohibited what are you doing this is Haram but to keep a rabbit to keep something that is permissible this is Allah insha Allah
